alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Lee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 02 at 8:56AM CST until January 02 at 12:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northwest and west central Illinois, east central and southeast Iowa and northeast Missouri. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Slick spots may develop on roads where temperatures are around or below freezing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reduced visibility will make travel conditions hazardous for the morning commute.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
